name: Night Dwarf
description:
Helps the dwarf to cross the room of a child by staying in the shadows.

Game for the Global Game Jam 2022 

Made in 48hours

Antonin Mercier - Game developer 

Sophie Maleval - 2D Artist 

Antoine Boucherikha - Sound designer 

Thomas Domé - Environment Artist 

 Wassim El Hammami - 3D Artist
